overview: Ko, a talented but egoist drummer dreams of becoming famous just like his idol, Chat Bodyslam. He suffers from a strange illness putting him asleep at anytime and anyplace beyond his control. This becomes the major obstacle of his dream as he may fall asleep during the concert. One day he meets a pretty and dreamy girl Som, his old high school friend. Som makes him want to form a band, so Ko accepts to join the nerdy guitarist Yod and the quiet bass-player Tui to play together. The band the welcomes Chod, a senior student as a leading singer. The chaotic dream, slumber, awakening, adventure and music making may or may not lead them to their ultimate goal.
title: My Rhythm
